pages.text: Advanced utility items crafted through alchemy. These powerful tools require $(violet)Resonant Catalysts$() and rare materials.

pages.title: Thunderous Wand
pages.text: The $(b)Thunderous Wand$() controls weather patterns using mana.$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Lightning Rod$(br)• Water Bucket$(br)• Powder Snow Bucket$(br)• Air Rune Stone$(br)• Water Rune Stone$(br)• Prismarine Crystals$(br)• Ghast Tear$(br)• Heart of the Sea$(br)• Conduit$(br)• Full Resonant Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 40 XP, 1600 ticks$()

pages.title: Using the Wand
pages.text: $(l)Weather Control:$()$(br2)$(violet)Right-Click:$()$(br)• Clear → Rain (1000 mana)$(br)• Rain → Thunder (2000 mana)$(br)• Thunder → Nothing$(br2)$(violet)Shift + Right-Click:$()$(br)• Clear Weather (500 mana)$(br2)All effects last 5 minutes!$(br2)$(#888)Draws mana from player and catalysts in inventory.$()

pages.title: Defiant Rift
pages.text: The $(b)Defiant Rift$() is a powerful combat tool forged from darkness and death.$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Netherite Sword$(br)• 2x Obelisk Shard$(br)• Wither Skeleton Skull$(br)• Death Rune Stone$(br)• Darkness Rune Stone$(br)• Totem of Undying$(br)• Nether Star$(br)• Blood Rune Stone$(br)• Full Resonant Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 60 XP, 2400 ticks$()

pages.title: Job Application
pages.text: The $(b)Job Application$() is a restorative tool combining life and light.$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Diamond$(br)• Emerald$(br)• Golden Apple$(br)• Life Rune Stone$(br)• Light Rune Stone$(br)• Totem of Undying$(br)• Enchanted Golden Apple$(br)• Beacon$(br)• Blood Rune Stone$(br)• Full Resonant Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 50 XP, 2000 ticks$()

pages.title: Enchanted Crystal
pages.text: The $(b)Enchanted Crystal$() is used in many advanced recipes.$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Amethyst Shard$(br)• Full Alchemical Catalyst$(br)• Ender Pearl$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 8 XP, 300 ticks$()$(br2)This is a key component for creating advanced items.
